author: Matt Stieb
title: Trump Administration Pushes Huge Environmental Rollbacks in Midst of Pandemic
description: Last week the administration allowed polluters to self-regulate during the crisis. Now it is expected to enact a major cut to car emission standards.
content: The Trump administration wouldnt let a little thing like a pandemic get in the way of its mission operandi of rolling back Obama-era policies. As the White House supports a lawsuit from Texas that would wipe out the Affordable Care Act, a New York Timesreport… [+4674 chars]
